head.p: Next level of fuel, transport, enterprise management

section-1.p: Service "Petrol Station-Online" provides control and accounting of fuel at the enterprise. Our solution is based on the data fixation from the equipment, its further uploading, reporting and remote management of the fuel dispensing system. This detects unauthorised fuel discharges, making the movement of fuel at the enterprise centralised and transparent. The implementation of the "Petrol Station-Online" service leads to a reduction of the company's expenses on fuel up to 30%.

section-2.p: Implementation of a transport monitoring system is a modern way to improve the efficiency of the fleet. Irrational use of vehicles, fuel theft and unscrupulous performance of labour duties by employees are problems faced by company managers without the use of monitoring. Keep track of routes, study the history of movements, control fuel consumption, engine speed, operating hours, vehicle speed and many other parameters. Garvex solutions provide complete fleet control, optimise your costs and improve driver discipline.

section-3.p: Warehouse is a service for storing and processing data on goods, raw materials and financial resources. All operations related to the storage and movement of goods are recorded here, which makes it possible to quickly clarify the location of goods, their quantity and total cost. The system helps to streamline and reduce the time required to prepare documents through the implementation of electronic document management, and simplifies the process of acceptance, movement and disposal of goods from the warehouse.

section-4.p: At many enterprises, the chain of fuel movement is a complex and extensive infrastructure, which complicates control and management, and leads to serious financial losses - from 5% to 30% of the total cost of purchased fuel. The solution to this problem is the use of an end-to-end fuel accounting system that promptly collects data on its movement from various sources, processes and analyses it, generating detailed reports and analytics. This will help you effectively control costs, optimise logistics and make management decisions. Avoid unnecessary expenses and make fuel management at your enterprise transparent and efficient!

section-5.p: The transport enterprise management system combines all services for the automatisation and digitalisation of core business processes. This allows the manager to remotely control the company, optimise planning, improve fleet efficiency, reduce staff and company costs, and automate all business processes from ordering to delivery of goods to the customer.

working.h2: Implement our solutions in the following industries:

section-1.p: Services provide accurate tracking of the location and routes of agricultural equipment, improving utilisation and simplifying work planning. They also help to efficiently manage fuel consumption by detecting leaks, preventing unauthorised use and optimising costs.

section-2.p: Optimising fuel management improves the overall efficiency of fuel industry companies. Services track fuel consumption and distribution at various stages of transportation, reducing the risks of errors and theft. This optimises the use of fuel reserves and ensures prompt response to emergency situations. Analytical reports based on service data provide valuable information for making reasoned decisions in planning, procurement and logistics optimisation.

section-3.p: The company's services provide continuous tracking of vehicle locations and trips, improving route planning, reducing road time and increasing the overall efficiency of logistics processes. In addition, fuel control and accounting services prevent unauthorised discharges and provide accurate monitoring of fuel consumption, facilitating fuel cost optimisation and green driving.

section-4.p: We provide control over the location and routes of specialised vehicles for accurate logistics planning at the construction site. Fuel management systems help to effectively manage fuel costs during road works, minimising expenses and optimising the use of resources in the construction process.

s3.p: Accounted litres of fuel per month

agreement.privacy: Privacy and Personal Data Processing Policy
agreement.p1: This Privacy and Personal Data Processing Policy (hereinafter referred to as the Policy) applies to all information posted on this website on the Internet at: https://garvex.tech /, including a content management system (CMS) and an embedded database (hereinafter referred to as the Website). The Policy was developed by the Site Administrator (Administrator). Use of the Site's services and visiting its pages means the unconditional consent of the User (i.e. any person who visited the Site) with this Policy and the conditions for processing his personal information specified therein information; in case of disagreement with these terms, the User must refrain from visiting The Site, the use of its information and services and leave the Site.
agreement.p3: 1.1. Within the framework of this Policy, the User's personal information is understood as:
agreement.p4: 1.1.1. Information that the User provides about himself/herself when registering on Website (account creation) or in the process of using the Site, including User data, including: - last name, first name, patronymic; - date of birth; - email address; - contact phone number; - links to social media profiles (pages); - image; - other information provided by the User through the Website;
agreement.p5: 1.1.2. Data that is automatically transmitted to the Site during their use using the software installed on the User's device, including the IP address, data cookies, information about the User's browser (or other program using which access to services is provided), technical specifications of the equipment and software the software used by the User, the date and time of access to the site, the addresses of the requested Site pages and other similar information. This information does not apply to personal data because it does not allow you to identify the User.
agreement.p6: 1.1.3. Other information about the User that the latter provides when working with the Site or using information from the Site.
agreement.p7: 1.1.4. This Privacy Policy applies only to the Site, does not control and does not is responsible for the websites of third parties to which the User can click on links, available on the Website.
agreement.p8: 2. PURPOSES OF PROCESSING USERS' PERSONAL INFORMATION
agreement.p9: 2.1. The Site collects and stores only the personal information that is necessary for and execution of agreements and contracts with the User.
agreement.p10: 2.2. The Site processes the User's personal information for the following purposes:
agreement.p11: 2.2.1. Identification of the User registered on the Site for the possibility of obtaining The user of access to information.
agreement.p12: 2.2.2. Providing the User with access to personalized Website resources.
agreement.p13: 2.2.3. Establishing feedback with the User, including sending notifications, requests, regarding the use of the Site, the provision of services, the processing of requests and requests from the User.
agreement.p14: 2.2.4. Determining the User's location to ensure safety, prevent fraud.
agreement.p15: 2.2.5. Confirmation of the accuracy and completeness of the personal data provided by the User.
agreement.p17: 2.2.7. Providing the User with effective customer and technical support in case of problems related to the use of the Site.
agreement.p19: 3. CONDITIONS FOR PROCESSING USERS' PERSONAL INFORMATION AND ITS TRANSFER TO THIRD PARTIES
agreement.p20: 3.1. The confidentiality of the User's personal information is maintained, except for cases where the User voluntarily provides information about himself for public access to an unlimited number of people .
agreement.p21: 3.2. The Site has the right to transfer the User's personal information to third parties in the following cases cases:
agreement.p22: 3.2.1. The transfer is necessary for use to fulfill a certain agreement or agreement with the User.
agreement.p23: 3.2.2. The transfer is provided for by Russian or other applicable legislation within the framework of the procedure established by law.
agreement.p24: 3.2.3. In case of sale of the Site, all obligations to comply with the terms and conditions are transferred to the buyer this Policy applies to the personal information received by him.
agreement.p25: 3.3. The processing of the User's personal data is carried out without time limit in any way in a legal manner, including in personal data information systems using automation tools or without the use of such tools. Processing of personal data Users are carried out in accordance with Federal Law No. 152-FZ dated 07/27/2006 "On personal data".
agreement.p26: 3.4. The Website processes personal data, technical information and other information about The User during the entire term of the agreements concluded between the User and By the administrator for the purpose of their execution.
agreement.p27: 3.5. The User hereby agrees to use the images uploaded to the Site (including the User's image), as well as information uploaded by them when using The Site, including on the resources of third parties. The User has the right to withdraw at any time your consent by sending a notification to the address of the Administrator's location.
agreement.p28: 3.6. Processing of the User's personal data means recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, refinement (update, modification), extraction, use, transfer (distribution, provision, access), depersonalization, blocking, deletion, destruction personal data of the User that do not fall under special categories for the processing of which According to the current legislation of the Russian Federation, the Administrator is required to written consent of the User.
agreement.p29: 3.7. The User gives consent to the Administrator to process his personal data, provided when using the Site, including the transfer of such personal data to third parties in fulfillment of agreements between the Administrator and the User, in order to fulfill agreements with the User, including for posting reviews about services provided by the Administrator services left by Users, in various sources of information, as well as for implementation partnership programs with such third parties, even when such transfer is carried out on the territory of other states.
agreement.p30: 3.8. The User agrees to receive information and promotional materials from the Administrator, or from other persons on behalf of the Administrator, to the email address and contact phone number (including by calling and sending messages) specified By the User when registering on the Site. The User has the right to refuse to receive such materials at any time.
agreement.p31: 3.9. The processing of the User's personal data is carried out by the Administrator using databases on the territory of the Russian Federation, both with and without automation tools .
agreement.p32: 3.10. In case of loss or disclosure of personal data, the Administrator informs the User about loss or disclosure of personal data.
agreement.p33: 3.11. The Administrator takes the necessary organizational and technical measures to protect protection of the User's personal information from unauthorized or accidental access, destruction, modification, blocking, copying, distribution, as well as from other illegal actions third parties.
agreement.p34: 3.12. The Administrator, together with the User, takes all necessary measures to prevent losses or other negative consequences caused by the loss or disclosure of personal data User data.
agreement.p35: 3.13. Third parties may use cookies, web beacons and other storage technologies to collect or receive information from the Site and use this information to collect statistical data, measurement and targeting of advertising. Disabling cookies by the User blocks this feature.
agreement.p36: 3.14. Disabling cookies by the User when using the Site may result in the inability to access to parts of the Site that require authorization.
agreement.p39: 4.1.1. Provide information and personal information necessary to use the Site.
agreement.p40: 4.1.2. Update and supplement the provided information about personal data in case of their changes.
agreement.p42: 4.2.1. Use the information received exclusively for the purposes specified in this article The Privacy Policy.
agreement.p43: 4.2.2. Ensure that confidential information is kept confidential, not disclosed without prior written permission of the User, as well as not to sell, exchange, publish or disclose the transferred personal data in other possible ways The User, except as provided for in this Privacy Policy.
agreement.p44: 4.2.3. Take precautions to protect the confidentiality of personal data The User according to the procedure usually used to protect this kind of information in the existing business turnover.
agreement.p45: 4.2.4. To block and delete personal data related to the relevant To the User, from the moment of the request or request of the User or his legal representative, or the authorized body for the protection of the rights of personal data subjects for the period of verification in the case of identification of false personal data or illegal actions.
agreement.p46: 4.2.5. Respond to User requests received by e-mail The Administrator, or through the feedback form of the Site no later than within 30 (thirty) calendar days from the date of receipt.
agreement.p47: 4.2.6. Respond to the User's legal requests within 15 (fifteen) calendar days from the moment they were received.
agreement.p49: 5.1. The Administrator, who has not fulfilled his obligations, is responsible for losses, incurred by the User in connection with the misuse of personal data, in particular in accordance with the legislation of the Russian Federation.
agreement.p50: 5.2. In case of loss or disclosure of confidential information, the Administrator is not responsible liability if this confidential information:
agreement.p51: 5.2.1. Became public domain before its loss or disclosure.
agreement.p52: 5.2.2. It was received from a third party before it was received by the Site Administration.
agreement.p53: 5.2.3. It was disclosed with the User's consent.
agreement.p55: 6.1. Before filing a lawsuit on disputes arising from the relationship between the User and By the Administration, it is mandatory to submit a claim (a written proposal for voluntary settlement of the dispute).
agreement.p56: 6.2. The recipient of the claim within 15 (fifteen) calendar days from the date of receipt of the claim notifies the applicant of the claim in writing about the results of the claim review.
agreement.p57: 6.3. If an agreement is not reached, the dispute will be referred to the court in accordance with the current legislation of the Russian Federation.
agreement.p58: 6.4. To this Privacy Policy and the relationship between the User and the Administration The current legislation of the Russian Federation applies to the Site.
agreement.p60: 7.1. The Administrator has the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy without consent The user. When making changes, the Administrator informs the User by e-mail by providing a link to the new version of the Policy.
agreement.p61: 7.2. The new Privacy Policy comes into force from the moment it is posted on the Site if the new version of the Privacy Policy does not provide otherwise.
